content: soho orchid by zuzana skrabakova for beautiful knitters yarn pattern begins 100g of *assigned pooling fingering 4ply/ sock weight yarn approximately 365 metres/ 399 yards section 1 set up part the sample in the photo is knit in beautiful knitters make a slip knot soho super-wash bluefaced leicester hight row 1 kf/b 2 sts 1 st increased twist in colour orchid row 2 kf/b slp1-wyif 3 sts 1 st increased row 3 k2 slp1-wyif needles & notions row 4 kf/b slp2-wyif 4 sts 1 st increased 3 5 mm us 3 60 cm or longer circular needles row 5 k3 slp1-wyif tapestry needle row 6 kf/b k1 slp2-wyif 5 sts 1 st increased gauge 6 stitches = 1 inch in garter stitch section 2 increase part size row 1 k to 1 st before end slp1-wyif approximately 120 cm/ 47 inches long and 52 cm/ row 2 kf/b k to 2 sts before end slp2-wyif 6 20 5 inches deep sts 1 st increased and at the same time when you knit with the pattern notes accent colour wrap the yarn twice round the a simple triangular scarf knit flat using *assigned needle creating single knit stitches with two pooling skein of yarn loops this doesn t apply to the edge stitches the size can be easily adjusted by knitting more/ which should be knit as normal on the following less row different weight yarn and/ or needles row drop the extra wrap off the needle as you can be substituted to achieve different effect and complete each double-wrap stitch size *assigned pooling takes place when a change in repeat row 1 and 2 until you have enough yarn stitch and texture is allocated to changes in colour to bind off approximately 4 times of the length of of a variegated skein of yarn the last row end with row 1 abreviations loosely bind off all stitches k knit kf/b knit into front and back of a stitch finish slp-wyif slip_stitch in purl direction with yarn in weave in ends and block as desired front st s stitch es www beautifulknitters co uk beautiful knitters 53 moreton street london sw1v 2ny uk all images and text © beautiful knitters 2022
